ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Level 26
ygData.msgSnippet: Well the reason as I understand it is that the groups have a HUGE level range, i.e.. last night my group was 34 cleric,24,26,29 Pallys,26 bard(me), and 24
ygData.messageBody:
Well the reason as I understand it is that the groups have a HUGE level
range, i.e.. last night my group was 34 cleric,24,26,29 Pallys,26 bard(me),
and 24 enchanter. when you pull you pull as far down as you want stuff and
then depending on where your group sets up you pull to your group, only one
puller at a time in the Hole, this is managed with /ooc'ing "In the Hole"
when puller is clear /ooc'ing "NEXT" there are hardly more then 2 or 3 in
gobbies in the pit at any time with this method and you fight non-stop.



-----Original Message-----
From: Harmonie Moonsong [mailto:harmoniemoonsong@...]

Just out of curiosity, why dont ppl set up in the
warrior and raider rooms... How do you know whose
spawns are whose, and how do you pull thru each other?




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
